${ModID}:StrengthStorm.NAME: Strength Storm
${ModID}:StrengthStorm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
${ModID}:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power card without exhaust, create a copy of it with exhaust in your discard pile.
${ModID}:DoubleUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a power card without exhaust, create a copy of it with exhaust in your discard pile.

${ModID}:SustainedOffence.NAME: Sustained Offence
${ModID}:SustainedOffence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !M! Damage to a random enemy, increased by Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal
Damage to a random enemy, increased by Strength.

${ModID}:SustainedDefence.NAME: Sustained Defence
${ModID}:SustainedDefence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block, increased by Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain

${ModID}:BranchOut.NAME: Branch Out
${ModID}:BranchOut.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Choose 1 of !M! powers from packs not available in your draft to add to your hand and deck.
